no_competitions: You are not part of any competition yet.
confirm_delete_competition: Are you sure you want to delete this competition?
competition_delete_error: An error occurred while deleting the competition
no_available_matches: There are no matches available to predict in the next 8 days.
no_submitted_predictions: You have no submitted predictions for upcoming matches.
prediction_error: There was an error submitting the prediction
edit_error: There was an error editing the prediction
no_predictions: You don't have any predictions yet.
not_logged_in_message: To view and edit your personal information, please log in.
name: Name
register_success: User registered successfully. Please log in.
select_league_alert: Please select a league for the competition.
competition_create_error: There was an error creating the competition.
no_public_competitions: There are no public competitions available.
already_joined: You are already registered in this competition.
join_success: You have successfully joined the competition.
join_failed_code: Could not join competition. Please check the code.

2025-08-15: A new chart was added to show prediction results per matchday in real time, improving transparency.
Fixed issues related to cache memory from deleted competitions.
Solved a bug preventing the update of recently finished matches.
2025-07-29: Visual improvements to the prediction section: cleaner and more professional layout.
Visual indicators for live and finished matches.
New colors to highlight points earned per prediction.
Rounds reordered to prioritize live matches.
2025-07-25: Added functionality to create and join both public and private competitions.
Now the app supports La Liga (Spain) and the Premier League (England).
2025-06-27: Implemented private group creation with unique invitation codes.
Added password recovery flow via reset link.
Created a new Instructions page and set it as the homepage.
Updated the Sidebar to show login button when no session is active.
Changed date format to dd/mm/yyyy across the Dashboard.
Ranking table now highlights the current user in green.
Removed email column from the ranking table.
Match data now updates automatically every 30 minutes.
Sidebar now overlays content and opens with a button.
Fixed registration success message display bug.
Logout button is now always visible on mobile.
Dashboard now displays name, email, and points.
2025-07-10: Implemented push notification system to remind users to make predictions before each match.
Backend sends notifications if less than 24 or 1 hour remain and the user hasn‚Äôt predicted yet.
Auto-registered the Service Worker to enable push notifications.
Updated Instructions to include steps for adding the app to iOS home screen.
Mobile compatibility improvements including PWA setup for Safari.
2025-07-07: Session is automatically closed if token expires and user is notified.
Date format changed to 'dd/mm/yyyy, HH:mm' and displayed in user's local time.
Team logos added to the Available Matches and User Predictions pages.
New columns added to 'matches' table: league_id, league_name, league_logo, league_season, league_round, home_team_logo, away_team_logo.
Ranking table now shows columns by round ('league_round') with user points.
Ranking table is now sortable by any column including rounds and total points.
User Predictions view is now responsive: matches are shown as cards on mobile.
2025-06-25: Matches disappear after making a prediction.
